Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base

Class AbstractComponentService<T extends ComponentType,C>

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.AbstractComponentService<T,C>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccordionServiceImpl, AlertServiceImpl, ButtonServiceImpl, CheckboxServiceImpl, InputServiceImpl, ItemListServiceImpl, LinkServiceImpl, LoaderServiceImpl, ModalServiceImpl, RadioServiceImpl, SelectServiceImpl, TableServiceImpl, TabServiceImpl, ToggleServiceImpl
public abstract class AbstractComponentService<T extends ComponentType,C> extends Object
Provides an abstract base class for managing UI component services.

This class serves as a generic service layer for handling UI components of various types. It maintains a registry of component instances and ensures efficient reuse.

Implementing classes must define how components are created based on a ComponentType. The component type is represented by T, which is an enumeration implementing ComponentType, and the actual UI component implementation is represented by C.

  • Method Details

    • getOrCreateComponent

      protected C getOrCreateComponent(T componentType)
      Retrieves a component instance for the specified type.

      If a component of the given type does not exist, it is created and stored.

      Parameters:
      componentType - The type of component to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The corresponding UI component instance.

    • createComponent

      protected abstract C createComponent(T componentType)
      Creates a new UI component instance for the specified type.

      Subclasses must provide an implementation to initialize components of type C.

      Parameters:
      componentType - The type of component to create.
      Returns:
      The newly created UI component instance.
